com.ibm.team.build.common.notification

Class NotificationCriteria

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.team.build.common.notification.NotificationCriteria
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NotificationCriteriaFromBuildDefinition

    public class NotificationCriteria
extends java.lang.Object
    Object used to store the criteria as to when and to whom email notifications should be sent for build lifecycle events
    Since:
    0.8

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NotificationCriteria.NotifyCondition
      Used to determine if email notification will be sent out for "completed" or "abandoned" builds based on the build result/status.

    • Method Detail

      • getCriteriaName

        public java.lang.String getCriteriaName()
        Returns:
        The name of the criteria.

      • setCriteriaName

        public void setCriteriaName(java.lang.String criteriaName)
        Parameters:
        criteriaName - The name of the criteria.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns:
        the boolean enabled state. Determines whether this criteria is enabled or not. Disabled criteria will not be processed by the email notifier.

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Parameters:
        enabled - Specifies whether this criteria is enabled or not. Disabled criteria will not be processed by the email notifier.

      • isPersonalCriteria

        public boolean isPersonalCriteria()
        Returns:
        The boolean decision as to whether notifications will be sent upon a personal build or not

      • setPersonalCriteria

        public void setPersonalCriteria(boolean personalCriteria)
        Parameters:
        personalCriteria - The boolean decision as to whether notifications will be sent upon a personal build or not

      • getNotifyCompletedCondition

        public NotificationCriteria.NotifyCondition getNotifyCompletedCondition()
        Returns:
        The condition as to whether notifications will be sent when a build has completed.

      • setNotifyCompletedCondition

        public void setNotifyCompletedCondition(NotificationCriteria.NotifyCondition notifyCompleted)
        Parameters:
        notifyCompleted - The condition as to whether notifications will be sent when a build has completed.

      • getNotifyAbandonedCondition

        public NotificationCriteria.NotifyCondition getNotifyAbandonedCondition()
        Returns:
        The condition as to whether notifications will be sent when a build has been abandoned.

      • setNotifyAbandonedCondition

        public void setNotifyAbandonedCondition(NotificationCriteria.NotifyCondition notifyAbandonedCondition)
        Parameters:
        notifyAbandonedCondition - The boolean decision whether notifications will be sent when a build has been abandoned.

      • getEmails

        public java.lang.String[] getEmails()
        Returns:
        The list of emails to be notified.

      • setEmails

        public void setEmails(java.lang.String[] emails)
        Parameters:
        emails - The list of emails to be notified.

      • isNotifySCM

        public boolean isNotifySCM()
        Returns:
        The boolean decision as to whether users who delivered changes will be notified or not

      • setNotifySCM

        public void setNotifySCM(boolean notifySCM)
        Parameters:
        notifySCM - The boolean decision as to whether users who delivered changes will be notified or not

      • isNotifyRequestor

        public boolean isNotifyRequestor()
        Returns:
        The boolean decision as to whether the requestor of the build will be notified or not

      • setNotifyRequestor

        public void setNotifyRequestor(boolean notifyRequestor)
        Parameters:
        notifyRequestor - The boolean decision as to whether the requestor of the build will be notified or not

      • getUsers

        public java.lang.String[] getUsers()
        Returns:
        The list of users (by user id) to be notified

      • setUsers

        public void setUsers(java.lang.String[] users)
        Parameters:
        users - The list of users (by user id) to be notified

      • getRoles

        public java.lang.String[] getRoles()
        Returns:
        The list of role types to be notified

      • setRoles

        public void setRoles(java.lang.String[] roles)
        Parameters:
        roles - The list of role types to be notified

      • getCriteriaSummary

        public java.lang.String getCriteriaSummary(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> userNameMap,
                                           java.lang.String delimiter)
        Parameters:
        userNameMap - A map from the user id to user name. This will allow the summary to show "<firstName> <lastName> (<userID>)" in the criteria summary. If the value is null, or the user id not found in the map, only the user id will be shown in the summary.
        delimiter - The delimiter used to separate each line.
        Returns:
        A detailed criteria summary.
